title: The "Mayura Rani" Diamond and Gemstone Haaram: A Regal Masterpiece
materials: meticulously set with brilliant-cut diamonds (VS Clarity
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a triple-layered design, culminating in a magnificent peacock (Mayura) motif. The centerpiece features two intricately crafted peacocks facing a ruby, surrounded by diamond-studded filigree work. The design incorporates traditional South Indian elements with a modern aesthetic. The pendant is a floral design, and it is surrounded by diamonds.
colors: Primary gold with sparkling white diamonds. Accents of vibrant green from the emeralds
and lustrous white from the pearls create a rich and harmonious color palette.
occasions: Perfect for grand celebrations such as weddings (వివాహ వేడుక)
and other significant cultural events. Also suitable for high-end galas and formal gatherings.
description: A true statement piece, the 'Mayura Rani' Haaram blends traditional South Indian design with modern luxury. The high-quality diamonds, precious gemstones, and meticulous craftsmanship make this a timeless investment. The peacock motif symbolizes beauty, prosperity, and royalty, making it an auspicious and meaningful addition to any jewelry collection.
